snippet: The pope made a pilgrimage to the Italian town of Assisi on the feast day of St. Francis, retracing the holy man’s footsteps and stressing the church’s commitment to care for the sick and the poor.
abstract: Pope Francis makes pilgrimage to town of Assisi, Italy, on feast day of St Francis, retracing the holy man's footsteps and stressing church's commitment to care for the sick and the poor.
lead_paragraph: The pope made a pilgrimage to the Italian town of Assisi on the feast day of St. Francis, retracing the holy man’s footsteps and stressing the church’s commitment to care for the sick and the poor.

headline.main: Pope Visits Assisi, Bearing the Message of a Favored Saint
headline.print_headline: Pope Visits Assisi, Bearing the Message of a Favored Saint
